resources.string:
Unable to download JS bundle from the dev server.

Try the following to fix the issue:
• Ensure that the packager server is running
• Ensure that your device/emulator is connected to your machine and has USB debugging enabled - run 'adb devices' to see a list of connected devices
• If you're on a physical device connected to the same machine, run 'adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081' to forward requests from your device
• If your device is on the same Wi-Fi network, set 'Debug server host & port for device' in 'Dev settings' to your machine's IP address and the port of the local dev server - e.g. 10.0.1.1:8081
Unable to connect with remote debugger
Oops, this chat is no longer available
Camera permission is required to take pictures
How could we have helped you better?
Message content not supported on this version. Please update the app
Audio Recording permission is required to capture and send voice messages
The permissions necessary for voice messaging have been granted
The permissions necessary for voice messaging have not been granted
Audio Recording permission and Write External Storage permission is required to capture and send voice messages
Write External Storage permission is required to capture and send voice messages
Freshchat SDK not initialized. Please invoke Freshchat.init() first and invoke {{method_name}} again!
This FAQ is no longer available
Sorry! There are no FAQs available
Connect to internet to view the rich media content

Audio will play through your ear piece
